des:
If you have problems, please contact us at service@lohasled.com
Try using our skill to control your home lighting and other devices via voice control! Just say your commands and Lohas Smart will execute them.

Here is a step by step guide:

(1). Download the "Lohas Smart" app from the Google Play Store or the iOS App Store.
(2). Start the app and register an account (or log in if you are already registered).
(3). Turn on your iO.e devices and connect them to the "Lohas Smart" app.
(4). IMPORTANT: You can rename the devices using the "Lohas Smart" app. If you name a smart light bulb "livingroom light", Echo will use the same name after discovering it in step 9 .
(5). Download the Amazon "Alexa" app from Amazon or from the Google Play Store or iOS App Store and connect Echo to the "Alexa" app.
(6). In the Alexa Skills directory, search "LOHAS SMART".
(7). Click Enable skill of "Lohas Smart" and then enter your Lohas Smart account username, password and region on the linked page.
(8). Say to Echo: "Alexa, discover devices".Wait till Echo says "Discover is completed";
(9). Now all settings are completed. Try to talk to Echo to control your devices.

Try saying the following voice commands.

Lighting:
- Alexa, turn on the bedroom light.
- Alexa, turn off the bedroom light.
- Alexa, dim the bedroom light to 20%.
 -Alexa, make the bedroom light gold.
-Alexa, set the bedroom light to warm white.
-Alexa, turn the livingroom light cool white.
